title: The PG shouldn't contribute to divisive political drama
text:
Published By: Pittsburgh Post: Opinion - Today 
Regarding the Oct. 14 article “Clinton, Sanders Clash in Dems’ First Debate”: There are so many ways that the PG could have introduced...
